name: product_data
description: Data on various financial products including types, risk, and dates

fields.fieldDescription: Unique identifier for the financial product
General category of the financial product (e.g., Equity, Fixed Income)
Specific type of financial instrument (e.g., ETF, CDO, Future)
Market where the product is traded (e.g., Exchange Traded, Private Placement)
Type of contract the product is associated with (e.g., Options Contract, Forwards Contract)
Type of risk associated with the product (e.g., Market Risk, Credit Risk)
Date when the product reaches maturity
Date when the product was first issued or started
